amendment.description: To require a report on the impact of the children of certain Filipino World War II veterans on the national security, foreign policy, and economic and humanitarian interests of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2269 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2269 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4190) To require a report on the impact of the children of certain Filipino World War II veterans on the national security, foreign policy, and economic and humanitarian interests of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2269 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2269 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
